name: Model Setup
description: Sets up the CAE neural network model.

inputParameters.name: inputML
inputParameters.description: List of variable names to be used as input to the model.

inputParameters.name: outputML
inputParameters.description: List of variable names to be used as output from the model.

inputParameters.name: hidden_layers
inputParameters.description: Width of each hidden layer (list of int).

inputParameters.name: set
inputParameters.description: Set to True to set up the model.

outputParameters.name: model_dims
outputParameters.description: Input and output dimensions of the model.
